name: YAIR!
description:
So you reached this page and you're wondering what's special about YAIR!?

Well, here's the answer: nothing! 

Because YAIR! is Yet Another Infinite Runner!

Features
  • Run endlessly collecting coins and avoiding obstacles (yep, like every other Infinite Runner).
  • Two different power-ups that help you to improve your scores: shields make you invulnerable to obstacles; magnets will attract all coins to you.
  • Defeat your own distance-traveled and coins-collected high-scores.*
  • Infinite achievements system.*
  • Challenge your Facebook friends in the leaderboard. *
  • Marvelous custom-made music from Jordi Casanova.

* On mobiles only.

Enjoy and leave a comment!

How To Play

On web, use the left and right arrows to change lanes, and the up arrow to jump.

On mobile, swipe left or right to change lanes, and swipe up to jump.
